TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TableCellCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public NotInheritable Class TableCellCollection Implements IList
public ref class TableCellCollection sealed : System::Collections::IList
type TableCellCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 將 控制項中構成列的 和 物件的集合封裝。

span.span: Encapsulates a collection of and objects that make up a row in a control.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個類別來以程式設計方式管理集合物件中的資料列的控制項。Use this class to programmatically manage a collection of objects that make up a row in a control. 這個類別常用來新增或移除中的資料列中的資料格控制項。This class is commonly used to add or remove cells from a row in a control. > [!NOTE] > A控制項包含集合，表示集合物件。A control contains a collection that represents a collection of objects. 每個代表資料表中的個別資料列，並包含集合，表示集合物件。Each represents an individual row in the table and contains a collection that represents a collection of objects. 這些物件代表資料表中的個別儲存格。These objects represent the individual cells in the table. 若要取得個別資料格，您必須先取得從的集合控制項。To get an individual cell, you must first get a from the collection of a control. 您可以取得從的集合。You can then get a from the collection of the . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何以程式設計的方式填滿控制項。The following example demonstrates how to programmatically fill a control. 物件，代表個別的儲存格，會加入至物件，代表個別的資料列中，透過屬性。 objects, which represent individual cells, are added to objects, which represent the individual rows, through the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic TableCellCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TableCellCollection Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic TableCellCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TableCellCollection Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 將 物件從指定的陣列附加至集合的結尾。

span.span: Appends the objects from the specified array to the end of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，將附加從指定的陣列至集合的物件。Use the method to append the objects from the specified array to the collection. 當您建構資料列的資料表，通常會使用這個方法。This method is commonly used when you are constructing a row of a table. 若要建構資料表的資料列，請先建立的陣列物件來代表資料列的資料格。To construct a row of a table, first create an array of objects to represent the cells of the row. 接下來，使用方法，將陣列傳遞做為引數，以新增物件加入集合。Next, use the method, passing the array as an argument, to add the objects to the collection. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來加入物件陣列，以從。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to add the objects from an array to a . 請注意，在此範例中，的屬性的執行個體類別。Note that in the example, the property of the is an instance of the class. summary.span: 從 移除所有 物件。

span.span: Removes all objects from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來移除所有物件從並設定屬性設為 0。Use this method to remove all objects from the and set the property to 0. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法會移除物件從，但它不會移除從控制項。This method removes the objects from the , but it does not remove the from the control. 務必也移除如果您想要完全移除資料表中的資料列。Be sure to also remove the if you want to completely remove a row from the table. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來移除所有中心資料表的資料列中的物件，並取代新物件。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to remove all objects from the center row of the table and replace them with new objects. summary.span: 傳回 實作的物件，其中包含 中所有的 物件。

span.span: Returns a implemented object that contains all objects in the .

returns.span: 實作物件，包含 內的所有 物件。

span.span: A implemented object that contains all objects within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來建立實作的物件，可以取得每個項目中透過輕鬆地反覆。Use this method to create a implemented object that can be iterated through easily to get each item in the . 使用屬性取得目前的項目指向集合中。Use the property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection. 使用方法，以移至下一步 的項目集合中。Use the method to move to the next item in the collection. 使用方法，將列舉值移回到初始位置。Use the method to move the enumerator back to the initial position. > [!NOTE] > 建立之後，就必須呼叫方法實作的物件或之後使用方法，將列舉程式移至集合中第一個項目。The method must be called after creating a implemented object or after using the method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection. 項目，否則為表示屬性未定義。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法用來建立實作的物件。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to create a implemented object. 它會逐一顯示選取的資料列中的項目。It is then iterated through to display the items in the selected row. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic TableCellCollection.GetEnumerator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TableCellCollection.GetEnumerator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic TableCellCollection.GetEnumerator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TableCellCollection.GetEnumerator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

param.span: 集合中要插入之物件的以零起始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index within the collection at which to insert the object.
The object to insert into the collection.

summary.span: 插入物件至集合中的指定索引處。

span.span: Inserts an object into the collection at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，您應該使用方法來加入項目物件。Typically, you should use the method to add an element to a object. 方法是明確的介面成員實作。The method is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
